title: A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE, MAYOR NEIL ANDREW NOCON, TO SIGN THE DEED OF DONATION WITH THE PHILIPPINE AMUSEMENT AND GAMING CORPORATION (PAGCOR) FOR THEIR DONATION OF ONE (1) UNIT OF PATIENT TRANSPORT VEHICLE TO THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS, THEREBY SUPPLEMENTING RESOLUTION NO. 2025-163 OF THE SANGGUNIANG BAYAN NG LOS BANOS. Author Co-Author
